title: Titanstring Bow
content:
Titanstring Bow Rare 2-9 Damage 1d8+1Piercing Titan Weapon: This weapon deals additional damage equal to your Strength Modifier. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The commonly held belief that archers are rangey, thin-wristed people is completely false. It takes years of training to pull a bowstring all the way back to your cheekbone, and wrists like iron. LongbowTwo-Handed18 m 1.1 310

Titan Weapon: This weapon deals additional damage equal to your Strength Modifi
